title: ollama/ollama
summary: The official Ollama repo: get up and running with Llama 2, Mistral, Gemma, and other models locally.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Ollama; chat, embed, pull, and manage models from Node or the browser.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client and SDK for Ollama; chat, generate, embed, list, pull, push models.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration to use any Ollama model as an LLM or chat endpoint in LangChain pipelines.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Feature-rich web UI for Ollama (chat UI, model management, multi-user, dark mode).

title: ollama-cli
summary: Community-built interactive CLI wrapper with syntax highlighting and prompt history.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension bringing local Ollama models into GitHub Copilot-style inline suggestions.

title: ollama.nvim
summary: Neovim plugin to chat with Ollama models inside the editor, generate code, or refactor selections.

title: ollama-telegram
summary: Telegram bot that proxies chats to a local Ollama instance; supports groups and private messages.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack 2.0 integration to use Ollama models as generators or embedders in Haystack pipelines.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/JVM client for Ollama with Kotlin extensions; chat, embed, pull, list models.

title: ollama-rb
summary: Official Ruby gem for Ollama; simple API to chat, generate, and manage models.

title: ollama-rs
summary: Community Rust crate for Ollama with async/tokio support and strong typing.

title: ollama-go
summary: Official Go client for Ollama; chat, generate, pull, push, delete, list, copy models.

title: ollama-docker-compose
summary: Official Docker image and compose examples (CPU & GPU) for running Ollama containerized.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Community Helm chart to deploy Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU node selection and PVC support.

title: ollama-huggingface
summary: Hugging Face inference.js library now supports Ollama endpoints for local model serving.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: Official C# / .NET client for Ollama; supports .NET 6+ with async streaming.

title: ollama-discord
summary: Discord bot that chats with Ollama locally; slash commands, thread support, and model switching.

title: ollama-models
summary: Official registry of Modelfiles for Llama 2, Mistral, CodeLlama, Gemma, etc., maintained by Ollama.
